page.title: 14The Arts
page.content: The Arts Every year Moretonhampstead has a christmas pantomime it is performed by The Variety Group which people 12 and over may join. The 1984 christmas pantomime was a performance of ALI BABA and the 40 THIEVES.Last year there was a pottery club for children but it closed down.Moretonhampstead school contributes to the arts of the town of Moretonhampstead by its choir,music club, handchime team and recorder team which are its musical contributions and Scottish dancing, broom dancing and country dancing which are its dancing contributions.
